title: Letterhead, A. E. Minstein Construction Co. / Engineers Contractors, Albertson, New York, early–mid-20th century
title_raw: A. E. Minstein Construction Co. / Engineers Contractors, Albertson, New York
medium: Letterpress: blue ink on white wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted in raised blue type below Company name:OFFICE: 864 WILLIS AVENUE.ALBERTSON N.Y. / P.O. BOX 461.ALBERTSON, N.Y. Phones PIoneer 6-1616/6-1618.  Imprinted at upper right in blue raised type: YARD / ALBERTSON R.R.STATION / ALBERTSON, N.Y.
description: Company name with address below across top of sheet. At right, vertical image of a block and tackle raising an I-Beam with outline of a sky-scraper in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, A. E. Minstein Construction Co. / Engineers Contractors, Albertson, New York, early–mid-20th century. Letterpress: blue ink on white wove paper. 
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1999-59-16
